name: jbase.vim
description: This is a syntax highlighting script for jBC -- the jBASE flavor of Pick Basic.
install_details:
Copy the script file to ~/.vim/syntax/jbase.vim or <vimdir>/syntax/jbase.vim and add these lines to filetype.vim or .vimrc:

" jBASE (Pick) Basic
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.b,*/*BP*/*              setf jbase
